mapper.select: select t.toast_no,m.member_nick,t.toast_contents, t.toast_date,t.t_file_path,t.t_file_name,t.t_file_realname,t.zzan_count from toast t , member m where t.member_id = m.member_id order by toast_no desc

SELECT tc.tc_no, tc.toast_no, m.member_nick, tc.tc_contents, tc.tc_zzan, tc.tc_date FROM toast t, toast_com tc, member m WHERE t.toast_no=tc.toast_no AND tc.member_id=m.member_id AND t.toast_no=#{toast_no} ORDER BY tc.tc_no DESC
mapper.update: update toast_com set tc_contents=#{tc_contents}, tc_date=sysdate where tc_no = #{tc_no}
update toast set zzan_count = zzan_count+1 where toast_no=#{toast_no}
update toast set zzan_count = zzan_count-1 where toast_no=#{toast_no}
mapper.delete: delete from toast_zzan where toast_no = #{toast_no} and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: select zzan_count from toast where toast_no =#{toast_no}

select toast_zzan.zzan_no, toast_zzan.toast_no, toast_zzan.member_id, toast_zzan.zzan_stat, toast.zzan_count from toast_zzan left outer join toast on toast_zzan.toast_no = toast.toast_no order by toast_no asc
select count(tc_no) from toast_com group by toast_no having toast_no = #{toast_no}
